title: LF low silver to low golds to join My 5v5 ranked team
body:
MY ign is CrypticNitrogen ive only just started playing ranked placed s4 in the preseason currently b3 rip but climbing out. looking for a dedicated  ppl willing to dedicate themselves to being in a 5v5 team just want to have some fun but also play some competitve league and aim for atleast having a gold 1 5v5 team bcos goals are important. i dont expect anyone to care for this but id really love to have a dedictaed team going so just PM on my account if your interested. i do have a few conditions and there will be sort of a try out process. i havent really decided but any help/suggestions or if you want to join please let me know. PS im a jg main {{champion:107}} {{champion:104}} {{champion:121}} {{champion:203}}  but i also can play/main mid {{champion:91}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:112}} {{champion:7}}  and can top{{champion:114}} {{champion:105}} {{champion:104}}{{champion:31}} 
must be willing to use skype/curse voice

replies.body:
Hi

I'm part of a clan that that has a NA team but I am trying to get a OCE one up and running, if you are interested feel free to come on to TS and have a chat and we can go from there.
TS Server:
ts.dmg-inc.com

I would like to sign up my Mrs to this team. She finished s4 last season and really wants to be in a ranked 5 team. This will also be her first team so I don't mind being her adc. Sign us both =) add tormenteddream and cinrouky. I finished plat 5 last season and use my smurf to duo with her =)
Add me in game, IGN is Jaksta123
